content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nAs the system, I received a command from my user to browse the website \'https://www.busytourist.com/most-beautiful-places-in-the-us/\' with the question "What are some fun things to do in nature in the US?".'}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'your computer', 'content': "Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: Some fun things to do in nature in the US include visiting national parks like Yellowstone, hiking in the Great Smoky Mountains, swimming in Lake Tahoe, exploring Arches National Park, snorkeling in Dry Tortugas National Park, and wildlife spotting in places like Bryce Canyon and Zion National Park. \n \n Links: ['Skip to Content (https://www.busytourist.com/most-beautiful-places-in-the-us/#content)', ' (https://www.busytourist.com/)', 'Africa (https://www.busytourist.com/category/destinations/africa/)', 'Asia (https://www.busytourist.com/category/destinations/asia/)', 'Japan (https://www.busytourist.com/category/destinations/asia/japan/)']"}, {'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "write_to_file", "args": {"filename": "fun_things_to_do_in_nature_US.txt", "text": "Some fun things to do in nature in the US include visiting national parks like Yellowstone, hiking in the Great Smoky Mountains, swimming in Lake Tahoe, exploring Arches National Park, snorkeling in Dry Tortugas National Park, and wildlife spotting in places like Bryce Canyon and Zion National Park."}}}'}, {'role': 'your computer', 'content': 'Command write_to_file returned: File written to successfully.'}, {'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "list_files", "args": {"directory": "."}}}'}, {'role': 'your computer', 'content': 'Failure: command list_files returned too much output.                         Do not execute this command again with the same arguments.'}, {'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "read_file", "args": {"filename": "fun_things_to_do_in_nature_US.txt"}}}'}]
"""
